question: Where does the person put a picture?
options: The person puts a picture on the shelf next to the frame.
The person puts a picture in the picture frame.
The person places a picture on the table in front of the frame.
The person sets a picture behind the picture frame on the wall.
The person puts a picture on the floor beneath the frame.

inference.prompt:
Carefully watch the first-person view video and pay attention to the cause and sequence of events, the detail and movement of objects, and the action and pose of persons.

(B) The person puts a picture in the picture frame.
(C) The person places a picture on the table in front of the frame.
